messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A Central Command offical is coming for a routine inspection. Please make sure your station is nice and up to code for his arrival! Keep the clown away from him if you can.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The Centcom official has docked at the ferry port. Please make him feel at home!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We haven't gotten any confirmation that Mr. Dabberino has arrived. Please confirm his safe arrival.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please ensure that Mister Dabberino gets onboard the evacuation shuttle with the rest of the crew. It's important that he returns in one peice.
